Direct message the job poster from Analytic Recruiting Inc.
Ursula Singh
Executive Recruiter | Analytics Recruiter | Data Science Machine Learning AI Recruiting
#24609 Risk Analytics ManagerSalary Range: $140K-$170KLocations: AZ, AR, CO, FL, GA, IL, IN, KY, ME, MD, MA, MI, MN, MO, MS, NE, NV, NJ, NY, NC, ND, OH, OK, OR, PA, SC, TN, TX, UT, WA, WYKeywords: Risk analytics, statistical modeling, machine learning techniques, portfolio risk management, scoring models, team leadRapidly growing financial firm seeking a Risk Analytics Manager who will be responsible for providing analytical research, analyzing, interpreting, and presenting operational and financial data. Will also be responsible for growing the overall analytical capabilities. Analyze large data sets using a variety of techniques ranging from research-driven methods to unsupervised machine learning techniques to understand key business problems. Must have a solid background in using statistical methodologies. Will regularly interact with senior leadership. This role will lead a team so must have management experience.QualificationsBachelor’s Degree in a quantitative field. Master’s degree a plus7+ years’ relevant experience with 2+ years leading a teamProficiency in SQL/Python/SASProficiency in statistical methods including probability theory and sampling, predictive modeling, test vs. control, and the application of these methodsPreferred Experience: Portfolio/risk management, quantitative analysis of capital assets, advanced loan and/or credit scoring models
